body_html:
@apaszke I reviewed the math as follows:

  • checked the sampler math for correctness
  • checked the .log_prob() math for PyTorch usage
  • ensured that unit tests tested agreement between this .log_prob() and Scipy's implementation.
body_text:
@apaszke I reviewed the math as follows:

checked the sampler math for correctness
checked the .log_prob() math for PyTorch usage
ensured that unit tests tested agreement between this .log_prob() and Scipy's implementation.
body:
@apaszke I reviewed the math as follows:
- checked the sampler math for correctness
- checked the `.log_prob()` math for PyTorch usage
- ensured that unit tests tested agreement between this `.log_prob()` and Scipy's implementation.
